Class ShowtimeService

java.lang.Object
com.javaoop.movie_booking_app.service.ShowtimeService
@Service public class ShowtimeService extends Object
Service class for managing showtime operations such as creation, update, retrieval, and conflict checking for movie showtimes in halls.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    ShowtimeService(ShowtimeRepository showtimeRepository, MovieRepository movieRepository, HallRepository hallRepository, SeatRepository seatRepository)
    Constructs a ShowtimeService with the required repositories.

  • Constructor Details

    • ShowtimeService

      @Autowired public ShowtimeService(ShowtimeRepository showtimeRepository, MovieRepository movieRepository, HallRepository hallRepository, SeatRepository seatRepository)
      Constructs a ShowtimeService with the required repositories.
      Parameters:
      showtimeRepository - repository for showtime data access
      movieRepository - repository for movie data access
      hallRepository - repository for hall data access
      seatRepository - repository for seat data access

  • Method Details

    • getShowtime

      public Optional<Showtime> getShowtime(Long showtimeId)
      Retrieves a showtime by its ID.
      Parameters:
      showtimeId - the ID of the showtime
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the showtime if found, otherwise empty

    • getMovieShowtimes

      public List<Showtime> getMovieShowtimes(Long movieId) throws IllegalStateException
      Retrieves all showtimes for a given movie, ordered by start time descending. Throws an IllegalStateException if the movie does not exist or is inactive.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie
      Returns:
      a list of showtimes for the movie
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if movie is not found or inactive

    • addNewShowtime

      public void addNewShowtime(Long movieId, ShowtimeDto showtimeDto) throws IllegalStateException, ShowtimeCollisionException
      Adds a new showtime for a movie in a specific hall. Validates movie existence and active state, hall existence, and time conflicts.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie
      showtimeDto - the data transfer object containing showtime details
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if movie or hall does not exist or movie inactive
      ShowtimeCollisionException - if there is a scheduling conflict in the hall

    • updateShowtime

      public void updateShowtime(Long showtimeId, ShowtimeDto showtimeDto) throws IllegalStateException, ShowtimeCollisionException
      Updates an existing showtime's start time and hall, ensuring no schedule conflicts.
      Parameters:
      showtimeId - the ID of the showtime to update
      showtimeDto - the data transfer object containing new showtime details
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if showtime or hall does not exist
      ShowtimeCollisionException - if scheduling conflicts exist with other showtimes

    • getBookedSeatIdsInShowtime

      public Set<Long> getBookedSeatIdsInShowtime(Long showtimeId)
      Retrieves the set of seat IDs that are already booked for a given showtime.
      Parameters:
      showtimeId - the ID of the showtime
      Returns:
      a set of seat IDs that are booked
